segments.text: Your family must be busy shopping for Christmas , now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh yeah and decorating the house too was colored paper and pictures . they will put a Christmas tree just inside the front door , pained toys and colored electric lights along the branches and plays all the gift packages under it
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Woo , your home will beautiful on Christmas .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I do wish your christmas and happy new year .
segments.speaker: S1
